title: New Galio is more like Aatrox than Aatrox is like Aatrox
body: His poke is better, faster, stronger, his dive knock up is more reliable, his ult is meaningful to team fights....geez, Aatrox really got the shaft.

replies.body: Galio can't heal at all though.
This post is sort of a joke. Obviously hes not exactly like Aatrox, but he sure got 2 things in his rework that Aatrox needed--a more reliable engage and a better poke.

His engage isn't even that reliable. 

And yes, I'm fun at parties.
Yeah i invited you to my party once, you got high and broke my old laptop, but that was fun, i never used that shit anyways

Everyone does what aatrox does but better, he litterly is top tier at nothing and thats one of the reason's why he's so hard to balance, if you look at every single melee champ you can find one thing they do that would have worked as an aatrox ability or does something he already does except better
